Jamshedpur, Jharkhand– 831001
WASTE WATER TREATMENT PLANT OPRATOR
Goal                       
Intention to excel in every sphere of life, exploit my full potential and knowledge acquired during the
course of education and Technical career for benefit of the organization as well as for the personal
growth, willing to work in a challenging and creative environment that inspires me to lead from the
front.
Qualification
                                                              Educational Qualification
Matriculation from J.S.E.B Ranchi in the year 2002.
Graduation from Ranchi University in the year 2008.
Technical Qualification
 
Three Years Diploma in AUTOMOBILE Engineering from INDIAN INSTITUTE OF AUTOMOBILE 
ENGINEERING, JAMSHEDPUR session 2006 to 2009.
Work Experience
Worked in USHA MARTIN INDUSTRIES LIMITED  as a Water & Sewage Treatment Plant 
Operator during the period from 11th October 2013 to Till Date.
Job Description
Responsible for the operation and maintenance of waste water treatment plant.
As  operator position decomposed all aspects of modern technological work in processing
Water for Industrial and other uses.
Maintenance factor of equipments and proper checking of the plant equipment (before the
operation),  which  often  attached  during  treatment  process  such  as  (fouling,  scaling,
corrosion) etc.
De-mineralization of water capacity 8 MGD, 9 MGD, 12 MGD and to check the correct
balance of the cooling water chemistry i.e. (PH, Hardness, conductivity etc.) to avoid
further disk-function of cooling tower or heat exchanger etc.
To have close look on the filter and valve functioning while pumping and back washing
process. Avoid water hammering etc. for smooth functioning. 
Position also decomposed in removing waste (solid material) and other impurities before
cooling process to avoid further the mal functioning of the system and equipments.
And also check the meter reading.
Annually clean the raw water tank and related water tank.
Annual open the sand filters or gravel filter and clean inside it.
Co-ordinates and compares instructions, records analyzers, indication according to the 
laboratory analysis evaluation adjustments for records in hourly data.
To check the previous shift report, checks the logbook for maintain the scheduled 
strategies.
                                                             Computer Proficiency
 Six month course in computer application from Sharptech Solution, Jamshedpur, (with MS Office,
internet, HTML, Web page designing, with basic knowledge of computer Software,)
Six month course in Autocad in Mechanical from Autodesk.
